String.string: Run event group 100 - Give "Ab" to NPC 1100
Use the chain explosion of a dementalith to destroy the ice door on the opposite side.
Jump at the right time to create a chain when the dementalith explodes. You can do it, right?
At the beginning of Fallen Ice Throne, switch the tension to 3
Hellen's movements have created an underground passage in the outer area.
Shall I show you how to do it?
